title: 2010.06.06-MotoGP.05.Italy.Race.BBC2_UK [TDMK1]
description:
2010.06.06-MotoGP.05.Italy.Race.BBC2_UK-TDMK1.m4v

The Italian Grand Prix. Jennie Gow introduces coverage of the fourth race of the season, held at Mugello, where Valentino Rossi is expected to receive a rapturous reception from his home fans. The world champion has won this race on seven occasions, but his run of victories was ended last year by Australian Casey Stoner. Commentary by Charlie Cox and Steve Parrish.

MP4 - 640x352 - 800Kb/s H264 Video - 44.1KHz/128Kbps Stereo AAC Audio

My belief is this is the best all round setup, and hopefully you will agree!

This video will play on a computer with VLC, XBMC, XBox360, PS3, all iPhones & iPad - enjoy the show... :)
